info.name: Gond
info.description: Gond, The Patron God of Smiths and Tinkerers
info.author: BloxBoss6

description.p: You have made your pact with a mysterious entity from the Gods of the Multiverse.
As the Lord of All Smiths, Gond has the ability to make all sorts of amazing mechanical devices. He sometimes decides to pass down this beautiful ability to his most trusted followers.

sheet.description: You have made your pact with a mysterious entity from the Gods of the Multiverse.

description.p: Gond lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

sheet.description: Gond lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

description.p: Gond looks favorably upon you and wishes to bestow you a gift. You receive a wolf-shaped automaton, which is about 3 feet tall at the shoulder. Has the ability to follow simple instructions, and has a built in saddle as well as a few small storage compartments. When not in use, it magically compacts into a small cube, roughly 4 inches in diameter with an incantation written on the top, "Bractha Fi Harog A Gond," or "Awaken, you Wolf of Gond." To shutdown, use the incantation "HÃ»m Fi Harog A Gond," or "Sleep, you Wolf of Gond."
Gond tells you that as long as he is still pleased with your work, more gifts shall be given.
